metadata.title: CVE-2023-52806 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:hda: Fix possible null-ptr-deref when assigning a stream While AudioDSPdrivers assign streams exclusively of HOST or LINK type, nothing blocks auser to attempt to assign a COUPLED stream. As supplied substream instancemay be a stub, what is the case when code-loading, such scenario ends withnull-ptr-deref.

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
